Periodic Release Dates for PAA
PAAs will be established on a periodic basis throughout the fiscal year to allow for an equitable distribution throughout the year.Â  PAAs will be created and released to the PMCs in
first quarter
third quarter, and
fourth quarter.
title: M21-1, Part XIV, Chapter 4, Section C - Federal Tax Information (FTI) Match:  Post Award Audit (PAA) for Pension and Parents' Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC) Beneficiaries
